title: Looking for Gold/Plat Top and Jungle for Competitive flex team
body:
**IMPORTANT: YOU MUST BE GOLD OR PLAT IN FLEX TO PLAY WITH OUR TEAM**

Our team is currently looking for a top lane and jungle to join us for flex games on a regular basis.
we are currently all gold/plat in solo/duo as well as flex, so we can only accept gold/plat flex ranking applicants.
we currently play from 7:30pm - 10:30pm AEDT (Melb time) Weekdays, excluding Wednesday, with weekends based on availability.

It is expected that applicants be able to accept constructive criticisms, as well as be willing to learn additional champions should the need arise (sorry, no one tricks)
A working microphone and willingness to communicate during game is also expected, as we will be using discord during games.

for more information or to apply, add either myself (Zami) or Shiney

replies.body: once again looking for both jungle and top, please add me if you have any questions :)
sorry, only need a jungler at this point
still looking for jungler for team
still looking for top laner especially, please add me for any questions
